allow: Bash(do sed -i '' 's/background-color: #E8683C; font-family: ''''Work Sans'''', Arial, sans-serif; color: black/background-color: #E8683C; font-family: ''''Work Sans'''', Arial, sans-serif; color: #F5F5F5/g' "$file")

Bash(do sed -i '' 's/background-color: #E8683C; font-family: ''''Work Sans'''', Arial, sans-serif; border-color: #E8683C; color: black/background-color: #E8683C; font-family: ''''Work Sans'''', Arial, sans-serif; border-color: #E8683C; color: #F5F5F5/g' "$file")
Bash(do sed -i '' 's/background-color: #E8683C; font-family: ''''DM Sans'''', sans-serif; color: #000/background-color: #E8683C; font-family: ''''DM Sans'''', sans-serif; color: #F5F5F5/g' "$file")
